numlitem.para: Procedures do not require their use, and
TSO headset earphones/headphones (or equivalent) are installed and operative.
When flight deck speaker(s) is inoperative, the affected pilot(s) must use headsets.

note.para: Only equipment approved under FAA Technical Standard Order (TSO), to include flightdeck microphones, headphones, and boom microphone headsets, may be used in UPS aircraft.

placard.para: Placard inoperative Flight Deck Speaker(s) "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
